div.div: Coronavirus Travel Information Survey for Students

div.span: Baird ISD is taking a proactive approach in order to prepare a response to COVID-19. The district has produced a survey accessible at the link below for parents, guardians, staff and community members in order to gather data about the potential risk of exposure without direct contact. This information will only be used for the district to make informed decisions in the best interest of the students, staff, and community as a whole.

While Baird ISD does not believe there is an immediate threat to our community, we believe that precautionary measures will give us the tools necessary to proceed in the best interest of all involved. We will continue to make decisions based on facts and completion of this survey by interested parties will help us proceed. We appreciate the efforts of all involved to ensure that our students, staff, and community are safe and health.

span.style: font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 20px; font-family: Arial; color: #ff0000;

a.span: Please take the survey by clicking here

p.span: All students will reach their full academic and social potential, will be prepared to grow further in education, and will be responsible adults and life-long learners in a global society.
